name: Documentation Generation from RAG
description: Converted from n8n workflow: Documentation Generation from RAG

webhookInfo.note: ⚠️ WEBHOOK EXECUTION POINT: This webhook can be executed via MCP at /api/workflows/execute with webhook path

parameters.query:
=SELECT * FROM search_documentation_knowledge(
  '{{$json.data[0].embedding}}'::vector,
  '{{$('Parse Documentation Request').item.json.doc_type}}'::doc_type,
  '{{$('Parse Documentation Request').item.json.audience}}'::audience_type,
  {{$('Parse Documentation Request').item.json.category ? "'" + $('Parse Documentation Request').item.json.category + "'" : 'NULL'}},
  0.7,
  20
)

parameters.columns: doc_type, audience, query, rag_sources, generated_content, mermaid_diagrams, file_path, source_count

edges.id: edge-Search RAG Knowledge-Combine and Organize Content
edge-Get System Relationships-Combine and Organize Content
edge-Get Active Components-Combine and Organize Content
edge-Combine and Organize Content-Generate Markdown Documentation

webhookExecutionPoints.note: ⚠️ WEBHOOK EXECUTION POINT: This webhook can be executed via MCP at /api/workflows/execute with webhook path
